oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Judy Baker Interviews at Corpus Christi
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This recording is for Hank Snow from Judy Baker and features interviews with Billy Walker, Lefty Frizzell, and Frances Whitfield. The recording is from an unidentified date. This tape is a two sided tape and this is tape 1 of 2. Tape is the twelfth of an unidentified number of tapes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow; Judy Baker; Billy Walker; Lefty Frizzell; Frances Whitfield;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Judy Baker's personal message to Hank Snow (who the tape was intended for) -- (03:01) Set up noises for Billy Walker interview -- (03:39) Back Street Affair (Billy Walker) -- (06:12) Baker and Walker discuss where Walker is traveling from and to -- (06:50) The two talk about Walker's friend -- (08:03) Baker talks about her favorite song of Walker's, "You Have My Heart Now" -- (08:12) Walker talks about his cold -- (08:25) Baker asks what is Walker's favorite song -- (08:32) What Makes Me Love You Like I Do (Billy Walker) -- (10:20) Baker asks about Walker's newest song -- (10:46) I'm Looking For Love (Billy Walker) -- (12:02) Song is interrupted by a separate recording -- (12:19) Back to the original recording with Baker and Walker discussing Walker's newest songs -- (13:19) Anything Your Heart Desires (Billy Walker) -- (14:58) Baker asks Walker who's style he likes the best -- (16:10) Baker talking to Snow again about the text tape she is recording with Lefty Frizzell and Frances Whitfield -- (16:52) Beginning of interview where everyone is trying to figure out where to sit -- (17:44) The three start talking about spaghetti and meatballs -- (18:34) Baker mentions a man named Leo -- (19:17) They start talking about the show the previous night -- (20:37) Baker asks Frizzell to name everyone in his band and their instruments -- (21:01) Al Florist talks about the band that is touring with Frizzell -- (22:37) Baker asks Frizzell where he's been and where he is going -- (24:02) Frizzell says thank you to Baker -- (24:31) Baker tries to tune Frizzell's guitar -- (24:55) California Blues (Lefty Frizzell) -- (27:10) Baker asks for another song -- (28:01) Frizzell strums on the guitar while having an undistinguishable conversation with Baker -- (28:19) I Love You A Thousand Ways (Lefty Frizzell) -- (30:27) Pistol Packing Papa (Lefty Frizzell) -- (31:46) Song cuts out
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Snow, Hank; Walker, Billy, 1929-2006; Walker, Billie (Vocalist); Frizzell, Lefty; Frizzell, Lefty, 1928-1975;
